code: import React from'react';import{Bar}from'react-chartjs-2';export default function LinearChart(props){var data={labels:props.labels,datasets:[{label:"COVID-19 confirmed cases - last 2 months",data:props.data,backgroundColor:"lightgreen",color:"rgba(009,009,250,0.75)",hoverBackgroundColor:"rgb(255,255,153,1)"}]};var options={legend:{display:true,fontColor:'white'},title:{display:true,text:"Finland - Covid19 - last 2 months",fontColor:'white'},scales:{yAxes:[{ticks:{fontColor:"white",fontSize:18,color:"rgba(2, 2, 2, 0.1)"}}],xAxes:[{ticks:{fontColor:"white",fontSize:14}}]}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"#555555"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Bar,{data:data,options:options}));}
